Smart Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that uses sensors to track the clothes you wear and make recommendations for outfits based on your style and preferences.
Multi-Purpose Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that can also serve as a bookshelf, a plant holder, and a place to hang artwork.
Self-Cleaning Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that uses UV lights to kill bacteria and odors on clothes, keeping them fresh and clean.
Foldable Clothes Hanger: A clothes hanger that can fold flat when not in use, making it easy to store in small spaces.
Smart Clothes Hanger with Voice Control: A clothes hanger that can be controlled by voice commands, allowing you to hang up and take down clothes without having to touch it.
